name: SimCity 2000: The Ultimate City Simulator
overview: It's a whole new game! This morning, you approved a new solar power plant, designed an underground transportation system, and jumped five points in the polls. Then you raised taxes (and lost 10 points), read a local newspaper, built a zoo and pushed your education bill through the city council. It's time for lunch - unless of course, there's a fire, earthquake, or alien invasion...
